characters.story: Askew not correct sings "Wigh!" cheerfully - crooked tilted uneven!
Rectify dart angel bends down drooping "Jyao" - correct pretentious!
Short of stature dart committee bends down drooping "Igh" - low not confident!
Sigh ay-ay mouth crossbow sings "Igh!" cheerfully - regretful exclamation!
"Igh!" Soil from the crossbow sang cheerfully - fine dust and particles!
Suffer fingers crossbow questions "Igh? Beaten?" curiously - endure beaten!
Cluster bamboo tribe commands sharply "Tsoo!" - bunch group!
Thatch flowers spear questions "Mao? Straw?" curiously - grass bushes pee!
Tangerine tree spear helmet legs mouth questions "Jyoo? Citrus?" curiously - orange fruit!
Relax give tongue sings "Shoo!" cheerfully - comfortable at ease!
Noble bow elbow questions "Hohng? Grand?" curiously - great magnificent!
Barbarian one bow questions "Yee? Savage?" curiously - foreigner!
"Yee, is that my mother's sister?" Woman questioned the barbarian curiously - maternal aunt, auntie!
Dividing line bow soil family feud sings "Jyahng!" cheerfully - border boundary!
"Jyahng!" Person in a family feud sang cheerfully - stiff, rigid with frozen limbs!
"Jyahng!" Flowers in a family feud sang cheerfully - ginger, spicy root for soup!
Porridge rice bent弓 sings "Joh!" cheerfully - rice soup monks little!
Bring to a boil water dollar sign commands sharply "Fay!" - bubble blood boiling!
"Foo, should I stroke it?" Fingers questioned the dollar sign curiously - caress, brush, embrace and hug!
"Tee!" Younger brother's knife commanded sharply - shave and cut hair with a razor!
"Tee!" Little brother's water commanded sharply - snot, nose mucus and tears!
"Tee!" Tree with younger brother sang cheerfully - a ladder, stairs and steps!
Decayed tree third bends down drooping "Shyo" - rotten crumbling can't carve!
"Pin!" Ear with sprout snare commanded sharply - employ, hire and appoint by letter!
Sacrifice cow drama sings "Shee!" cheerfully - give up chess piece!
